<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Solar (Archangel)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=545)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Solars are among the greatest of all angels, ranking just below empyreal lords. Many solars serve at the right hand of a deity or champion a cause that benefits an entire world. Most archangels resemble humanoids, but not all—they can adopt more unusual forms as needed. A typical solar is about 9 feet tall and weighs about 500 pounds, with a commanding voice that is impossible to ignore. Most have silvery or golden skin.

Solars are legendary trackers; the most masterful of them are said to be able to follow the centuries-old passage of a pit fiend flying through the Astral Plane.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Celestial](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 51

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 49

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 46
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Angel_Solar.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 23">[Solar](/Monsters.aspx?ID=545)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Angel" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=8" />
<trait label="Celestial" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=23" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 16 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +40; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +38, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +43, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +43, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +43, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +36, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +46

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +10

**Dex** +6

**Con** +8

**Int** +5

**Wis** +9

**Cha** +10
</row>

**Items**
_+3 [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24)_, _+3 [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 49 

**Fort** +40 

**Ref** +34 

**Will** +37 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 500

, regeneration 20 (deactivated by evil)

**Weaknesses**
evil 25

**Aura of Protection** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) 20 feet. Allies in the solar's aura gain a +2 status bonus to AC against evil creatures and a +2 status bonus to saves against effects from evil creatures. The bonus increases to +4 against control by evil creatures and attacks by evil summoned creatures. When the solar or an ally is hit by an attack from a creature in the aura, that foe must succeed at a DC 43 Will save or be blinded for 1 minute (this is an [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) effect). It's then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, fly 100 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_holy greatsword_ +44 ([Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 4d12+22 slashing plus 2d6 good

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_holy longbow_ +40 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 4d8+17 piercing plus 2d6 good and arrow of mortality

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 46, spell attack +38
- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; self only)
- **4th**
[Dimensional Anchor](/Spells.aspx?ID=70) (at will)
- **5th**
[Breath of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=29), [Death Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=64)
- **6th**
[Restoration](/Spells.aspx?ID=258) (at will)
- **7th**
[Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222), [Remove Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=252) (at will)
- **9th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (at will), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Overwhelming Presence](/Spells.aspx?ID=212), [Power Word Blind](/Spells.aspx?ID=226), [Power Word Kill](/Spells.aspx?ID=227), [Sunburst](/Spells.aspx?ID=326)
- **10th**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Power Word Stun](/Spells.aspx?ID=228), [Remove Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=250), [Remove Disease](/Spells.aspx?ID=251), [Revival](/Spells.aspx?ID=262)
- **Constant (10th)**
[Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (evil only), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Rituals** DC 46

- **1st**
[Angelic Messenger](/Rituals.aspx?ID=22)
- **2nd**
[Animate Object](/Rituals.aspx?ID=1)
- **5th**
[Call Spirit](/Rituals.aspx?ID=5), [Resurrect](/Rituals.aspx?ID=20)
- **8th**
[Freedom](/Rituals.aspx?ID=11), [Imprisonment](/Rituals.aspx?ID=13)

**Animate Weapon** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Trigger** The solar hits with a melee weapon Strike while Animate Weapon is not already in effect; **Effect** The solar's weapon leaps into the air and moves with the solar as if held with both hands. The weapon gains the effects of the [dancing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=293) weapon rune for 1 minute.

**Arrow of Mortality**   The solar doesn't need to provide ammunition for their bow. When they draw their bow, they create a magical arrow of light that sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius until the end of the solar's next turn. On a critical hit with the arrow, if the target has 75 or fewer Hit Points after taking the damage, it drops to 0 Hit Points and becomes [dying 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) (or, if it was already dying, increases its dying value by 3).

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The solar can take on the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid. This doesn't change their Speed or Strikes.

**Holy Armaments**  ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) Any weapon gains the effect of a [holy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=299) property rune while a solar wields it.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Solar Genesis</title>

Unlike most angels, solars are created from divine energy, sometimes blended with good souls. They are joined in this distinction by the ancient empyrean angels.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-3" />
